cluster_relations.rel_desc: Fear of the unknown is a core recurring theme in urban legends.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Scope: urban legends like the "Hook Man"

cluster_relations.rel_desc: A perceived threat of danger is a core recurring theme in urban legends.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Urban Legend Emotional Themes and Responses

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a central recurring theme or motif within the narrative or narrative category represented by the object.
args.justification: Both relations link an emotional concept (fear of the unknown, threat of danger) to 'urban legends' as a central recurring theme, with rel_hint_type 'thematic association' and nearly identical wording. A single predicate 'is_core_theme_of' cleanly captures that the subject is a central theme in the object narrative category.
Both relations describe how an emotional concept functions as a core narrative theme within urban legends, fitting a class focused on relationships between narratives and their thematic elements.
The relations express a non-causal, non-spatial linkage indicating thematic association between emotional concepts and a category of stories; this best fits a broad ASSOCIATION group.
